title: Exploring ngrok for Local Server Tunneling
excerpt: Found an impressive tool, ngrok, for connecting local servers to the internet while developing my AI assistant, Echo Ava.
author: Codem
content:
Discovering ngrok for Remote Access

When researching methods for connecting Echo Ava (My Artificial Voice Assistant) over to my phone, I came across a very interesting tool called ngrok.

What is ngrok?

It can be used to connect local running servers to the internet to be accessed easily from anywhere.

I made a simple web interface and was easily able to stream audio and text through it by connecting it to a Flask server running on my machine.

Although it does require a restart every now and then due to free account limits, it is a rather impressive and interesting tool to use for development and testing.
